Accounting Services and Solutions

Powerful, scalable accounting built for Asia’s business environment.

Robust accounting is essential for business growth, but Asia’s fast-changing environment brings challenges in compliance, cost, and real-time visibility. Whether your business is startup, SME, or restructuring enterprise, the right accounting support ensures continuity and smarter decision-making.

Dezan Shira & Associates delivers scalable, technology-powered accounting services, backed by certified professionals across Asia. Our cloud-based platforms offer transparency, automation, and cost efficiency, helping clients consolidate finances across jurisdictions and manage daily operations. We support businesses from setup through expansion, providing localized compliance aligned with international standards. Our solutions deliver confidence, control, and deeper advisory support as business needs evolve.

How we can help your business

Accounting Solutions: Our Advantage

Cost-effective, scalable service delivery

Leverage automation to ensure affordable, efficient accounting that adapts to business size, stage, and cross-border operations.

Technology-driven financial oversight

Deploy customized platforms for compliance, reporting, and expense management, with secure integration to enable real-time visibility and control.

Cross-functional advisory expertise

Access integrated support across tax, audit, legal, HR, and IT to guide structuring, compliance, and financial strategy decisions.

Explore Our Tax Services

As one of the leading firms for registering foreign-owned businesses in Asia, we are equipped to advise clients regarding the optimal options for structuring a company to meet their objectives. Our teams advise on all matters relating to establishment, cross- border asset transfers, relocation, as well as mergers and acquisitions.

  • Corporate Structuring
  • Corporate Establishment
  • Company Liquidation and Deregistration
  • Organizational Restructuring and Divestiture
Send Enquiry

Keeping entities well-structured and legally compliant throughout the year is challenging for any international company, especially for operations in jurisdictions where regulations and requirements frequently change. Our Corporate Secretarial services are designed to provide companies with the reliable support needed for them to know with confidence that their entities in Asia remain in compliance, and are several steps ahead of internal and regulatory changes. The packages we offer are flexible, affordable, and tailored to the needs of each client, either as a stand-alone service or in combination with our regular accounting, tax, or legal advisory services.

Send Enquiry

  • Corporate Governance System Establishment and Policies Drafting
  • Amendment of Company Registration
  • Resolutions, Articles of Association, Internal Rules
  • Business Compliance
  • Corporate ESG and Sustainability
  • Anti-Corruption and Anti-Bribery Training and Investigations
  • Anti-Money Laundering Review
  • Internal Control Review and System Establishment
  • Whistleblowing Investigations
  • Response to Regulatory Investigations
Send Enquiry

PEO (Professional Employer Organizations) help companies to onboard staff in Asia rapidly, in full compliance with local laws, and without the investment required to set up and operate an overseas legal entity.

As a strategy, this allows a company to test market entry into one or more Asian countries, and then retain the option to easily scale back, switch to a different country, or upon proven success in the market, to proceed in establishing a formal presence.

Send Enquiry Learn about how PEO works

  • Corporate Structuring 
  • Company Registration
  • Joint Venture Negotiation
  • Intellectual Property Registration
Send Enquiry

Software options we offer for China:

  • If you are a small business without your own accounting software, we can provide you with our secure online accounting system, powered by Microsoft, at no charge!
  • We can also use any locally compliant accounting software that your company owns or help you implement or integrate a custom ERP or financial system of your own.
Learn about Digitizing Expense Management in China

Why choose us

Secure and integrated

We process clients’ transactions and reporting using secure, enterprise grade financial and reporting software. Our system is a protected Microsoft processing and file sharing environment, which we customize to meet the needs of small or medium sized customers, and integrate with important productivity, reporting, and back office apps.

Better Data and Controls

Our accounting method provides a more controlled process with clear internal checkpoints and more robust datasets which we leverage on your behalf during your accounting cycle. At each step, we can put the right person on the job, to produce better and more streamlined outcomes without overcharging fees.

Analytics Dashboards

Each month, to compliment the monthly reports that you receive and the communications with your Accounting Manager, you also receive access to online PowerBI reports. These reports can be used from any device to check your monthly finances, or search for certain expense items, with just a few clicks.

Software Features

The accounting processing software that we use internally provides:

  • easy-use online monthly report dashboards
  • seamless integration with local tax software (China Golden Tax System)

Our accounting module can be optionally configured to integrate with other services and feature-rich tools:

  • Customized chart of accounts and reporting
  • Integration with banking institutions for remote and online payment approvals and processing
  • Integrated Digital Expense Management software (for PO’s and reimbursements)
  • Advanced reporting tools (beyond the included basic dashboards)
  • Robust cloud-based accounting reports in near real-time
  • Online HR administration
  • ERP

We can utilize the same processing engine for all our locations in China. Clients with multiple locations can enjoy the same standards in reporting and the cost benefits of a consolidated service!

Software options we offer for Vietnam:

  • If you do not have your own accounting software and are a smaller business, we can provide you with our secure online accounting system, AMIS.VN at no charge.
  • Alternatively, we can also use any locally compliant accounting software that your company owns or help you to implement or integrate a customize ERP or financial system of your own.

About AMIS

AMIS is a secure and locally compliant software. It is popular in Vietnam among small and medium sized companies operating in the market.

We own the software but provide it to our smaller clients as an included part of our basic services. We also pass the realized efficiency savings of using this software back to you as a value-add.

We process clients’ transactions and reporting using this secure financial and reporting software. This provides a more controlled process with clear internal checkpoints, and more robust data sets, which we can leverage throughout your accounting cycle on your behalf. At each step, we put the right person to the job, to produce better and more streamlined outcomes, without overcharging fees.

Each month, to compliment the monthly reports that you receive and the communications with your Accounting Manager, you will also have access to online reports by MISA. These reports can be accessed from any device to check your monthly finances, or search for certain expense items, with just a few clicks.

AMIS.VN Features

  • Easy-use online monthly report dashboards
  • Online reports and item searching
  • Accessible from any PC or mobile device (version on mobile is integrated with AI application such as CFO features and HR features which allow the CEO to grasp all the finance and human resource situations of the company with a few simple questions)
  • Invoice management functionality
  • Banking integration for remote and online bill payments and bank reconciliation (some institutions only)
  • Seamless integration with local tax software

Optionally, depending on the clients’ needs, we can configure our recommended accounting software to provide:

  • Customized chart of accounts and reporting
  • Advanced reporting tools
  • ERP
PackagesSoftware
  • Bookkeeping

    Number of bookkeeping transactions processed each month.

  • Cashier Management

    Number of online payments processed each month (other payment types are optional).

  • Multiple Currency Option

    Bookkeeping in multiple currencies.

  • Statutory Financial Statements

    Preparation and delivery of statutory monthly statements.

  • Online Report Dashboard

    View financial highlights and search expense items remotely on any device.

  • Expense Management

    A tool for managing expense reimbursements.

  • Management Reports

    Monthly general ledger and AR & AP reports in Excel format.

  • Preferred Accounting Software

    Including XERO, MYOB, USB, Oracle, ACCPAC or Zetta System among other.

  • Virtual Meetings

    Regular calls to review your accounts using enterprise collaboration tools.

  • Advanced Online Reporting

    Advanced financial reporting tool powered by a reporting tool integration.

  • Monthly rates start from (SGD)

We offer accounting software options to clients in Singapore:

  • If you do not have your own accounting software, we’ll recommend XERO, and as a XERO Partner we can help provide and get you started on this secure online accounting platform, at no charge.
  • Alternatively, if your organization uses another accounting, financial or ERP system, we can help you implement, integrate, or customize it for local compliance.

About XERO

XERO is a secure software used by tens of thousands of small and medium sized companies around the world.

We include XERO as a part of our basic services for our clients with smaller businesses. We also pass the realized efficiency savings of using this software back to you as a value-add.

We process clients’ transactions and reporting using this secure financial and reporting software. This provides a more controlled process with clear internal checkpoints, and more robust data sets, which we can leverage throughout your accounting cycle on your behalf. At each step, we put the right person on the job, to produce better and more streamlined outcomes, without overcharging fees.

Each month, to compliment the monthly reports that you receive and the communications with your Accounting Manager, you will also have access to online reports by XERO. These reports can be accessed from any device to check your monthly finances, or search for certain expense items, with just a few clicks.

XERO Features

  • Easy-use online monthly report dashboards
  • Invoice management functionality
  • Expense management modules for PO’s and reimbursements
  • Basic payroll management
  • Seamless integration with banking institutions for remote and online bill payments and bank reconciliation

Optionally, depending on the clients’ needs, we can configure our recommended accounting software to provide:

  • Customized chart of accounts and reporting
  • Inventory management
  • Claims management
  • Advanced reporting tools: Robust cloud-based accounting reports in near real time
  • Online HR administration
  • ERP

Tax Faqs

As one of the leading firms for registering foreign-owned businesses in Asia, we are equipped to advise clients regarding the optimal options for structuring a company to meet their objectives. Our teams advise on all matters relating to establishment, cross- border asset transfers, relocation, as well as mergers and acquisitions.

  • Corporate Structuring
  • Corporate Establishment
  • Company Liquidation and Deregistration
  • Organizational Restructuring and Divestiture
Send Enquiry

Keeping entities well-structured and legally compliant throughout the year is challenging for any international company, especially for operations in jurisdictions where regulations and requirements frequently change. Our Corporate Secretarial services are designed to provide companies with the reliable support needed for them to know with confidence that their entities in Asia remain in compliance, and are several steps ahead of internal and regulatory changes. The packages we offer are flexible, affordable, and tailored to the needs of each client, either as a stand-alone service or in combination with our regular accounting, tax, or legal advisory services.

Send Enquiry

  • Corporate Governance System Establishment and Policies Drafting
  • Amendment of Company Registration
  • Resolutions, Articles of Association, Internal Rules
  • Business Compliance
  • Corporate ESG and Sustainability
  • Anti-Corruption and Anti-Bribery Training and Investigations
  • Anti-Money Laundering Review
  • Internal Control Review and System Establishment
  • Whistleblowing Investigations
  • Response to Regulatory Investigations
Send Enquiry

PEO (Professional Employer Organizations) help companies to onboard staff in Asia rapidly, in full compliance with local laws, and without the investment required to set up and operate an overseas legal entity.

As a strategy, this allows a company to test market entry into one or more Asian countries, and then retain the option to easily scale back, switch to a different country, or upon proven success in the market, to proceed in establishing a formal presence.

Send Enquiry Learn about how PEO works

  • Corporate Structuring 
  • Company Registration
  • Joint Venture Negotiation
  • Intellectual Property Registration
Send Enquiry
